title: Lawsuit Says Trump Worked with Fox on DNC Aide Story (Audio)
itunes:title: Lawsuit Says Trump Worked with Fox on DNC Aide Story (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Erik Larson, a legal reporter for Bloomberg News, discusses a new lawsuit, which accuses President Trump of collaborating with Fox News to concoct a story claiming a Democratic National Committee staffer was killed in retaliation for leaking Hillary Clinton’s emails to Wikileaks. He speaks with June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
